article_node.title: Rumor Replay: New Apple TV 4K, cellular MacBook Pro, Home camera, more
article_node.summary: Recent rumors suggest that Apple is planning significant updates across its product lineup, including a new Apple TV 4K featuring an A17 Pro chip, a Studio Display 2 with an A19 Pro chip, and an M5 MacBook Pro with cellular capabilities expected to launch in 2026. Additionally, Apple is reportedly developing a range of smart home products, including security cameras and a new HomePod with a touchscreen, while Siri is set for a major overhaul with AI enhancements and a new visual design. These developments indicate Apple's ongoing commitment to integrating advanced technology into its ecosystem.
